title: Buying Challenger Ahri gave me negative RP
body:
So I have an issue after purchasing the Challenger Ahri skin. Before I bought it I had around 829 RP. With it being -50% off I should have been left with 342 RP. Instead, The purchase system thought I was buying it for full price, at 975, and has left me with -146 RP total.

Could I get some help in fixing this? I'd hate to have to buy for RP just to kick myself outta the negatives.

 [ScreenShot of my Purchase history, showing that I now own the skin, and that it shows it said it was bought for 487..](http://puu.sh/lZopk/1ad5135656.png)

[ScreenShot of the Challenger Ahri skin in the Champions page, showing I own it, and my negative RP balance. ](http://puu.sh/lZoFf/1c192ce594.png)

Any assistance from Riot would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Try relogging.  On the backend it's not showing a negative amount. :D
Thanks! Weird that it happened :P It's all good now.
